title: Strong Junior Python Developer
description:
MB Digital is an innovative software development firm with a sharp focus on crafting sophisticated Web and App solutions, alongside providing comprehensive staff augmentation services.

Established in 2017 by an American entrepreneur, our company has been at the forefront of developing intricate web and app projects tailored to meet the exacting needs of our clientele, predominantly from the United States.

Our working conditions:

Fixed payment in $.
Vacation - 18 working days per year, 10 Sick Days.
Systematic salary review 2 times a year.
50% coverage of English language courses.
For those who live in Lviv, there is an opportunity to visit the office or you can work remotely and plan your working hours independently.

And now we have an opening for a Strong Junior Python Developer position in our company.

What our ideal candidate is responsible for:

Development and optimization of web application backend in Python/Django.
Creating a REST API in Python using Django.
Integration with databases (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, etc.).
Writing Unit tests and integration tests.
Participation in code review and optimization of existing code.
Adherence to the principles of clean code and design patterns.
Debugging and profiling programs to optimize performance.
Documentation of code and APIs.
Collaboration with front-end developers on integration.
Researching and implementing new technologies and libraries.
Adherence to version control processes (Git).
Completing tasks in accordance with requirements and deadlines.

What experience and skills we expect:

At least 1.5 years of experience with Python and Django.
Experience with REST APIs, understanding of HTTP principles.
Experience in integration with relational (SQLite, PostgreSQL, etc.) and non-relational (MongoDB, Redis, etc.) databases.
Ability to write unit tests, understanding of TDD concept.
Use of the Git version control system.
Knowledge of object-oriented programming, data structures and algorithms.
Analytical thinking, debugging and code profiling skills.
Good level of English (reading technical documentation).
Ability to work in a team, take responsibility for your part of the project.
The desire to write clean, readable, optimized code.

title: Junior Python Verification Engineer
description:
We invite a skilled Firmware Python Verification Engineer with up to 2 years of experience in Quality Assurance and Python programming language to join PLVision. In this role, you will ensure the quality and reliability of our customers' products. You will work closely with hardware engineers to ensure seamless integration between firmware and networking equipment.

At PLVision, we offer numerous opportunities to secure your career development while working in a thriving Ukrainian company with an in-demand specialization. We work with the latest technologies and contribute to open source, collaborating with professionals from Microsoft, Intel, Cisco, NVIDIA, Meta and more. If you are seeking a long-term project in a future-proof technology domain, apply for this vacancy and become part of our expert team.

About PLVision

We are a software product development company specializing in computer networking and embedded systems. PLVision has offices in Krakow, Poland, and in Ukraine: Lviv, Odesa, Kyiv, and Kharkiv (currently relocated). Founded in 2007, the company helps networking industry leaders and ambitious startups in the U.S., Israel, and the EU countries to launch innovative products.

Vacancy responsibilities:
- Develop networking test cases for new and existing products with an emphasis on emulating customer environments
- Perform research and analysis to implement the best solutions
- Cooperate with internal teams (e.g., developers and product managers) to identify system requirements
- Be a strong advocate for software quality

Vacancy requirements:
¬∑ Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or Software/Computer/Communications Engineering
¬∑ Up to 2 years of experience in Python
¬∑ Strong understanding of OOAD (Object-Oriented Analysis and Design)
¬∑ Strong analytical, debugging and problem-solving skills
¬∑ Good verbal and written communication skills
¬∑ Knowledge of technical English at the Intermediate level and higher is a must

Vacancy plus options:
- Basic knowledge of network communication protocols
- Knowledge of CI (Continuous Integration) methodology and tools (e.g., Gerrit, Jenkins)
- Work experience in an Agile/Scrum environment
- Experience with Linux at the user level
- Experience in software testing and test automation

title: Python Developer (Junior)
description:
We`re looking for our team Profisea Labs Junior Python Developer!

Profisea Labs, an innovative cloud management platform, is capable of handling all the most painful points felt by CloudOps engineers and IT managers who face increasing pressure to cut down IT costs, but only in a way that doesn't do any damage to business value. Profisea Labs is a new generation AI-Based multi-cloud management platform that helps users visualize cloud assets, maximize cloud utilization, reduce waste, and lower cloud spending pursuing business goals.

Requirements:
- Familiarity with Python
- Good English
- Desire to learn something new and useful.
- BS in computer science.

Your Responsibilities:
- Develop solutions according to technical and business requirements
- Design new functionality
- Be a part of international team of experts with a warm and friendly atmosphere
- All we need from you is your desire to do great things!

What we Offer:
- Great Salary
- Flexible work hours
- Career growth
- Medical insurance
- Sport compensations
- Professional working environment, where you‚Äôd be an essential member of our company

title: Junior Python Developer
description:
Are you a skilled Junior Python Developer eager to contribute to the development of an AI-powered automated trading platform? We're waiting for you to join our Development Team!

Responsibilities and duties

- Participate in the design, development, and maintenance of a sophisticated AI-powered trading platform using Python, Flask, and related technologies
- Actively participate in a remote development team environment, reporting to the Project Manager and collaborating effectively with team members
- Continuously seek innovative solutions and improvements to enhance the platform's capabilities and user experience in a rapidly changing crypto market

Work experience

- 1+ years of proven experience in Python Development
- Bachelor‚Äôs degree

Required skills

- Proficiency in Python
- Flask, Celery, Pytest expertise
- SQL (Postgres), NoSQL (Redis) knowledge
- Bash, Docker experience

Will be a plus

- English ‚Äì B2
- Personal Projects
- Experience in Web 3, trading or machine learning

If you are an individual with strong attention to details, and you have a passion for Python, and if you meet these requirements and responsibilities, we encourage you to apply for the Junior Python Developer position. If you‚Äôre still reading this, then we‚Äôre waiting for your CV, portfolio and cover letter.

title: Junior RPA developer
description:
RPA Developer(UiPath) at UAI Labs

The RPA Developer (UiPath) is responsible for designing, developing, and implementing automation solutions using the UiPath platform. The successful candidate will be a member of our team and will work closely with other developers, stakeholders, and users to deliver high-quality automation solutions that meet the needs of the business.


Qualifications:
- Bachelor‚Äôs degree or student in computer science or a related field
- Experience in programming in one of the following languages C, C++,
C#, Java, Python, VB.Net, VBA, JavaScript
- Speak & write English (Intermediate and above)
- Great problem-solving and analytical skills
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
- Have willing to learn new technologies
- Willing to work in an open-minded atmosphere

Would be a plus:
- Experience with a variety of RPA tools and technologies


Responsibilities:
- Design, develop, and implement automation solutions using UiPath
platform
- Work with stakeholders to gather requirements and design solutions
- Develop and maintain UiPath bots and scripts
- Troubleshoot and resolve automation issues
- Stay up-to-date on the latest UiPath technologies and trends


We offer:
- Remote working format
- A competitive compensation package
- Personalized career growth
- Professional development tools (mentorship program, tech talks and
trainings, centers of excellence, and more)
- Friendly and professional team
- Paid vacation days, sick leaves, and days off
- Accounting service

title: Junior Backend Developer (Python + Django)
description:
We are an innovative and dynamic company leader in its field. We firmly believe that our employees are our greatest asset and invest significant resources in their growth and development. Our unique corporate culture emphasizes creativity, teamwork, and a passion for design. By joining our team, you can contribute to projects that shape the future of our business while developing your professional skills in a supportive and encouraging environment.

We are seeking a highly motivated Junior Backend Developer with expertise in Python and Django to join our dynamic team. This is a fantastic opportunity for individuals looking to further their career in a professional IT environment.

Key responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with our experienced development team to design, develop, and maintain backend solutions using Python and Django.
‚Ä¢ Assist in the implementation of scalable and efficient web products.
‚Ä¢ Participate in code reviews and contribute to the continuous improvement of coding standards and best practices.
‚Ä¢ Troubleshoot and debug issues to ensure optimal performance and functionality.
‚Ä¢ Work closely with front-end developers and other team members to deliver high-quality, integrated solutions.

Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Minimum of 1 year of relevant work experience in IT companies (experience gained through training, freelancing, or personal projects will not be considered).
‚Ä¢ Strong knowledge of Python and web development frameworks, with a focus on Django.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with RESTful API development and integration.
‚Ä¢ Understanding of database systems.
‚Ä¢ Experience with version control systems, preferably Git.
‚Ä¢ Good communication and teamwork skills.
‚Ä¢ A passion for learning and staying up-to-date with industry trends and emerging technologies.

What we offer:
‚Ä¢ An opportunity to work with a dynamic team of experienced professionals.
‚Ä¢ Career growth and development opportunities.
‚Ä¢ A collaborative and innovative work environment.
‚Ä¢ Ongoing learning and skill-building initiatives.

We encourage you to apply if you meet the above requirements and are eager to take your career to the next level.

A persuasive request - before giving feedback, watch our video and start with the offer you will find after watching the video.
This is to protect against those who slander reviews with ChatGpt - we just won't read them if you don't start with the right words :)

title: Junior Python Developer (full stack)
description:
We are currently seeking a motivated and skilled Junior Python Developer with a passion for full-stack development.

Required skills:
- Minimum of one year of hands-on experience with Python, Django, and Django ORM;
- Good understanding of JavaScript/Typescript and practical experience with it;
- OOP, SOLID, Design Patterns;
- Code reviews and adherence to best coding practices;
- Understanding how to work with SQL and Postgres databases;
- Knowledge of AI integration concepts;
- Experience in working with REST API;
- Familiar with version control using Git and containerization with Docker;
- At least Intermediate in English.


Will be a plus:
- Practical experience with ML frameworks: OpenCV, Tensorflow/PyTorch;
- Understanding how to work with Pandas and Numpy;
- Cloud platform experience (AWS, GCP, or Azure);
- Practical experience with JS frameworks React/Vue;
- Experience with Linux (sh/bash);
- Unit testing.

We offer:
Opportunities for career growth and personal development, to help you improve your skills and achieve your goals;
Educational programs that are covered by the company at 30% of the expense;
Paid vacation leave and public holidays (21 vacation days annually);
Competitive salary with regular performance reviews;
Outdoor team activities are paid for by the company;
English language improvement through extensive communication;
The chance to work alongside highly experienced and enthusiastic IT professionals who are ready to share their knowledge and help you gain invaluable experience in a live IT environment.
technologies: ['Databases', 'Version Control', 'Azure', 'REST API', 'Django', 'PyTorch', 'SQL', 'Code Review', 'Docker', 'Python', 'Full-stack development', 'Git', 'Unit Testing', 'Containerization', 'NumPy', 'Unit testing', 'TensorFlow', 'Pandas']
